website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for dishes that resist breakage and fit ample amounts of food, this set is a nice alternative to traditional options.
pros: Stand out for their copper/stainless steel construction that allows users to place them directly on all types of cooktops
Deep dishes – 8 and 11 inches – accommodate large portions
cons: Some reports of food sticking with repeated use

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have now had these for 9 months and have used them on a daily basis. These have given me nothing but trouble with the food sticking. I have other Copper Chef pans and they do not stick or have any issues, but these 2 definitely do. Rice, eggs, sauces, you name it and it sticks to these pans. Once it sticks it is a nightmare to clean. I have done everything the manual states and these things still stick. I do not recommend these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Began to stick after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks, food began to stick, it was good for hardly any time before becoming bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about how wonderful these are. I do everything with my copper chef pots and pans. I literally start Mac and cheese on the stove top and then bake it in the oven in the large square pot. The darn thing comes out clean every time! Nothing sticks to these pans! My husband can’t even burn anything in them, it’s a miracle!!! (Sorry hon!) My mom buys the cheaper off brand copper ones and please people don’t waste your money, they DO burn and they DO peel and the construction quality sucks. Copper chef is built strong to last and they are a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They are really light  can't be best for peice.
customer_reviews.text: Read previous reviews some good some negative. Already had one liked. The 8in glass lid doesn't fit right because of metal band around edge.have to live with. Wanted specifically to use the convection setting in microwave. Taking hot items out above ur face these handles will be nice. Some negative results sounded like misuse I put paper towels between to stack. Scratching can be prevented with little care. Mfg. Instructs need to be read. Need to be seasoned Some oils not to be used, I used cocanut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customerjoanne

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST pans you will ever purchase!!!! Nothing sticks! I love these pans soooo much I bought 3 fry pans at TJMax. One for me and the others for 2 friends. They are getting them for Christmas!! I use mine everyday. Make sure you buy this brand and not a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Easy clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Bought the set and I have already used these 2 pots several times. Just as advertised. Just make sure you read the directions enclosed in the packaging. EASY to clean (much easier to clean than even Teflon) Heats up EVENLY. Love the lids. I will be buying more of these
customer_reviews.author: Angeline

customer_reviews.title: Great pots if you love to cook!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots! Easy to cook with and cleaning is a snap!!

customer_reviews.title: I'm addicted to Copper Chef!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! The 8-inch fits perfectly in my countertop toaster/convection oven (without the lid but still wonderful to be able to use it and not heat up the kitchen). Easy to clean and useful for just about anything you can make in a skillet, roasting dish, or Dutch oven.

customer_reviews.title: Love

customer_reviews.title: Copper Chef - Worth It! (I do wait for sales/price cuts)
customer_reviews.text: I am loving the Copper Chef pans. I bought some fry pans too. Yes you need to "treat" them, but that's not a big deal. I love to cook, and good pans make it easier. Love the fry pans too. I'm getting older, so it's not as easy to flip a fritatta, So I will partially cook it on the stove, then put it in the oven - No sticking!!!

customer_reviews.title: Not for convection stove
customer_reviews.text: It works great when it works. It doesn't heat evenly though. I have a convection stove, which is advertised to work on.. but it works intermittently. When it does work, the center remains hot while the corners stay at a much lower temperature. I almost feel as it I was cooking on a grill.. hit in some areas.. and I love my food around to "slow cook" stuff while the center is nearly burning. The non stick advertisement is 100% true. And the non oil needed, yes! 100% true as well!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are absolutely amazing! I haven't used any other pan in my cupboard since receiving them. They cook perfectly and clean up is beyond easy. I look forward to purchasing other copper chef items to help simplify everyday cooking as well as holiday cooking. It will definitely be nice not being stuck in the kitchen cleaning during the holidays, get to enjoy more family time and less cleaning time! I highly recommend to anyone thinking about purchasing. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased mainly to be used with vegetables and pastas. We needed something small that will do the job and this was what we ended up going with. An amazing choice. The copper has a nice heating to it. It will not hold the flavor and ruin one dish to the next which was a concern when cooking vegetables. On a few occasions we have used the deep fryer and to our surprise it worked well. Overall this is a great addition to our kitchen. I will point this is not our go-to pot. We use it on occassion, but when we use it, we have had nothing but amazing food in flavor, texture, and taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lilith

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these as the commercial looked amazing. Wasn’t sure if they would live up to ...

We even “tested” it out when we first got it and tried to burn a piece of cheese on there. Came right off. So easy to clean! I’m so impressed that I bought more! I want to replace all my pots/pans with these

customer_reviews.title: Copper Chef deep pans
customer_reviews.text: The sizes of the Copper Chef pans are ideal for family use. The pans are deep enough to be used for casseroles and family meals. The pans themselves are top quality. They are extremely easy to clean with the no-stick surface, and the side handles make putting the pans in and out of the oven very convenient. The glass lids fit well and are good quality. I rated the feature of weight as middle of the scale since the pans are heavy enough to cook well without scorching, but not so heavy that they are difficult to lift.

Easy to clean up even when you burn something in them accidentally. A good investment.

product_meta.title: Copper Chef 8" /11" Deep Dish Pan 4 Pc Set
product_meta.description: our all-around square casserole pans are designed with professional Cerami-Tech, Nonstick Technology so nothing sticks to the surface. Unique square design gives you up to 25% more cooking space than ordinary casserole pans. The extra large 11" square pan design gives you up to a whopping 60% more room to cook more food. Goes straight into the oven from any stovetop with 850° heat resistance. Innovative Stainless Steel Induction Technology distributes heat rapidly to all four corners of the pan for even cooking every time. Perfect for any surface: electric, gas, ceramic, or induction.
feature_bullets: DEEP DISH PANS FOR MULTI-PURPOSE USE: Deep dish design & unique square pan shape give you the room you need for baking, frying, broiling, sautéing, steaming, braising & more. Use as a roasting pan for pork loin, baking dish for casseroles, cakes or pies, frying pan for chicken, steaks, potatoes, veggies & more, or as a slow cooker for soups and stews.

STAINLESS STEEL INDUCTION PLATE: Each pan has a steel induction plate for rapid, even heat distribution from edge to edge. Your pan heats up faster and your meals cook to even perfection without hot spots. Use in the oven or on any stovetop: electric, induction, ceramic & gas.

BEST NONSTICK COOKING EXPERIENCE: Every pan is coating with Cerami-Tech, Copper Chef’s exclusive PTFE & PFOA FREE nonstick coating. It’s so super non stick, nothing sticks to the surface of the pan, not even burnt cheese! Plus, there’s no butter or oil required. These pans are not pre-seasoned. Clean-up is easy because there’s no reside left behind. Dishwasher Safe.
HARD ANODIZED PAN: Heavy-duty aluminum construction is hard anodized for maximum durability, ultimate strength and professional performance.

COPPER CHEF – SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: At Copper Chef Cookware, our mission is to bring you only the highest quality pots and pans, baking sheets, skillets & more at the lowest possible prices. We believe every family can enjoy healthy, mouthwatering, perfectly cooked meals without breaking the bank or spending hours in the kitchen.
